verses.verse: <S%G3785>Would<s%> to God you could <S%G430>bear<s%> with me a <S%G3397>little<s%> in my <S%G877>folly:<s%> and <S%G235>indeed<s%> <S%G430>bear<s%> with me.

For I am <S%G2206>jealous<s%> over you with <S%G2596>godly<s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2205>jealousy:<s%> for I have <S%G718>espoused<s%> you to <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G435>husband,<s%> that I may <S%G3936>present<s%> you as a <S%G53>chaste<s%> <S%G3933>virgin<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But I <S%G5399>fear,<s%> <S%G3381>lest<s%> by <S%G3381>any<s%> <S%G4458>means,<s%> as the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> <S%G1818>beguiled<s%> <S%G2096>Eve<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> his <S%G3834>subtlety,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3540>minds<s%> should be <S%G5351>corrupted<s%> from the <S%G572>simplicity<s%> that is in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> he that <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G2784>preaches<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have not <S%G2784>preached,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> if you <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have not <S%G2983>received,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> which you have not <S%G1209>accepted,<s%> you might <S%G2573>well<s%> <S%G430>bear<s%> with him.
For I <S%G3049>suppose<s%> I was not a <S%G3367>whit<s%> <S%G5302>behind<s%> the <S%G5228>very<s%> most <S%G5228>chief<s%> <S%G3029><s%> <S%G652>apostles.<s%>

But <S%G1499>though<s%> I be <S%G2399>rude<s%> in <S%G3056>speech,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> not in <S%G1108>knowledge;<s%> but we have been <S%G1722>thoroughly<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> you in <S%G3956>all<s%> things.

Have I <S%G4160>committed<s%> an <S%G266>offense<s%> in <S%G5013>abasing<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> that you might be <S%G5312>exalted,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I have <S%G2097>preached<s%> to you the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1432>freely?<s%>
I <S%G4813>robbed<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1577>churches,<s%> <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G3800>wages<s%> of them, to do you <S%G1248>service.<s%>

And when I was <S%G3918>present<s%> with you, and <S%G5302>wanted,<s%> I was <S%G2655>chargeable<s%> to <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man:<s%> for that which was <S%G5303>lacking<s%> to me the <S%G80>brothers<s%> which <S%G2064>came<s%> from <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> <S%G4322>supplied:<s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> things I have <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> from being <S%G4>burdensome<s%> to you, and so will I <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G1683>myself.<s%>

As the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is in me, <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3762><s%> man shall <S%G5420>stop<s%> me of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2746>boasting<s%> in the <S%G2824>regions<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia.<s%>
<S%G1302>Why?<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G25>love<s%> you not? <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knows.<s%>

But <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G4160>do,<s%> that I will <S%G4160>do,<s%> that I may <S%G1581>cut<s%> <S%G1581>off<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> from them which <S%G2309>desire<s%> <S%G874>occasion;<s%> that <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> they <S%G2744>glory,<s%> they may be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as we.

For <S%G5108>such<s%> are <S%G5570>false<s%> <S%G5570>apostles,<s%> <S%G1386>deceitful<s%> <S%G2040>workers,<s%> <S%G3345>transforming<s%> themselves <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2298>marvel;<s%> for <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> is <S%G3345>transformed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of <S%G5457>light.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> it is <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> thing <S%G1499>if<s%> his <S%G1249>ministers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G3345>transformed<s%> as the <S%G1249>ministers<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> shall be <S%G2596>according<s%> to their <S%G2041>works.<s%>

I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> me a <S%G878>fool;<s%> <S%G1490>if<s%> <S%G1490>otherwise,<s%> <S%G2579>yet<s%> as a <S%G878>fool<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> me, that I may <S%G2744>boast<s%> myself a <S%G3397>little.<s%>

That <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2980>speak,<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> it not <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> but as it were <S%G1722>foolishly,<s%> <S%G877><s%> in <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5287>confidence<s%> of <S%G2746>boasting.<s%>
<S%G1893>Seeing<s%> that <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> I will <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G2504>also.<s%>
For you <S%G430>suffer<s%> <S%G878>fools<s%> <S%G2234>gladly,<s%> seeing you yourselves are <S%G5429>wise.<s%>

For you <S%G430>suffer,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2615>bring<s%> you into <S%G2615>bondage,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2719>devour<s%> you, <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%> of you, <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1869>exalt<s%> himself, <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1194>smite<s%> you <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G4383>face.<s%>

I <S%G3004>speak<s%> as <S%G2596>concerning<s%> <S%G819>reproach,<s%> as <S%G3754>though<s%> we had been <S%G770>weak.<s%> However, when <S%G1722>ever<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> is <S%G5111>bold,<s%> (I <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G1722>foolishly,<s%> <S%G877><s%>) I am bold <S%G5111>also.<s%> <S%G2504><s%>
Are they <S%G1445>Hebrews?<s%> <S%G2504>so<s%> am I. Are they <S%G2475>Israelites?<s%> <S%G2504>so<s%> am I. Are they the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham?<s%> <S%G2504>so<s%> am I.

Are they <S%G1249>ministers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ?<s%> (I <S%G2980>speak<s%> as a <S%G3912>fool)<s%> I am <S%G5228>more;<s%> in <S%G2873>labors<s%> <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>abundant,<s%> in <S%G4127>stripes<s%> <S%G5234>above<s%> <S%G5234>measure,<s%> in <S%G5438>prisons<s%> <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>frequent,<s%> in <S%G2288>deaths<s%> <S%G4178>oft.<s%>
Of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3999>five<s%> <S%G3999>times<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> I <S%G5062>forty<s%> stripes <S%G3844>save<s%> <S%G3391>one.<s%>

<S%G5151>Thrice<s%> was I <S%G4463>beaten<s%> with <S%G4463>rods,<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> was I <S%G3034>stoned,<s%> <S%G5151>thrice<s%> I suffered <S%G3489>shipwreck,<s%> a <S%G3574>night<s%> and a <S%G3574>day<s%> I have <S%G4160>been<s%> in the <S%G1037>deep;<s%>

In <S%G3597>journeys<s%> <S%G3740>often,<s%> in <S%G2794>perils<s%> of <S%G4215>waters,<s%> in <S%G2794>perils<s%> of <S%G3027>robbers,<s%> in <S%G2794>perils<s%> by my own <S%G1085>countrymen,<s%> in <S%G2794>perils<s%> by the <S%G1484>heathen,<s%> in <S%G2794>perils<s%> in the <S%G4172>city,<s%> in <S%G2794>perils<s%> in the <S%G2047>wilderness,<s%> in <S%G2794>perils<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> in <S%G2794>perils<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5569>false<s%> <S%G5569>brothers;<s%>

In <S%G2873>weariness<s%> and <S%G3449>painfulness,<s%> in <S%G70>watchings<s%> <S%G3740>often,<s%> in <S%G3042>hunger<s%> and <S%G1373>thirst,<s%> in <S%G3521>fastings<s%> <S%G3740>often,<s%> in <S%G5592>cold<s%> and <S%G1132>nakedness.<s%>

<S%G5565>Beside<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things that are <S%G3924>without,<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1999>comes<s%> on me <S%G2596>daily,<s%> <S%G2250><s%> the <S%G3308>care<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches.<s%>
<S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G770>weak,<s%> and I am not <S%G770>weak?<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G4624>offended,<s%> and I <S%G4448>burn<s%> not?
<S%G1487>If<s%> I <S%G1163>must<s%> needs <S%G2744>glory,<s%> I will <S%G2744>glory<s%> of the things which <S%G4012>concern<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G769>infirmities.<s%>

The <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2128>blessed<s%> for ever <S%G1519>more,<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> that I <S%G5574>lie<s%> not.

In <S%G1154>Damascus<s%> the <S%G1481>governor<s%> under <S%G702>Aretas<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G5432>kept<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of the <S%G1153>Damascenes<s%> with a <S%G5432>garrison,<s%> <S%G2309>desirous<s%> to <S%G4084>apprehend<s%> me:
And <S%G1223>through<s%> a <S%G2376>window<s%> in a <S%G4553>basket<s%> was I <S%G5465>let<s%> <S%G5465>down<s%> by the <S%G5038>wall,<s%> and <S%G1628>escaped<s%> his <S%G5495>hands.<s%>
